Text:
Stop whining and buy a 2TB harddrive or two. That's what i did, I have 5TB of space, and it's extremely nice not having to worry about space EVER.

On another note, yes, the .RAR'ing is unneccesary, but most private trackers (such as scene-trackers) require .RAR'd uploads, a .sfv and a .NFO-file because it's standard procedure on their sites.
